body:
Comment 24 by **aidanphs**: 
Ok, I have a standalone (intermittent) reproduction with no non-core imports.
 - go to https://gist.github.com/aidanhs/7605681
 - put conn.go and script.sh in an arbitrary folder
 - ensure nothing is listening on port 9000
 - run script.sh
 - leave it running for an hour (or you can check back every 10 mins or so) to generate lots of log files
 - run `find ./log -not -size 9c` to list any log files not of size 9 bytes. These are probably of interest.
